overview: "Sir" Bob Thing is a tit-deprived "idiot" who's lived in a bathtub all his life.  The celestial Mama Jama gives him the commission to search for the "impeccable pair of fleshy orbs" with the understanding that his success will re-establish and set the world back into the proper order of erotic well-being.  Sir Bob's guide and companion on his quest is a talking pocket pussy with an attitude.  That should help.
tagline: A Star-Spangled Tribute to America's Hottest Hooters!
title: Hootermania
